segments.text: Your house is very old . Does it need redecorating ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Shall I help you with it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don ’ t suppose you could .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have much time . I suppose it can be done .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ ll be glad if you would .
segments.speaker: S2
